name: Sweet Tooth (ZamboniMacaroni)
description:
Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45

Controls:
- Arrow Keys = Movement
- E Key = Ring doorbell & pick up candy
- Spacebar = Attack

Costumes / Shop Modifiers:
- Skates: Increase Movement Speed
- Gloves: Increase Combat Damage
- Everything else: Adds to your Candy Multipliers from Houses
- The more expensive the better the multiplier

Shop Modifiers roll over to the next playthrough!

Re-equip already purchased items on restart!

Visit us online: https://www.zambo.fun/
